scripts.local: npm run local:build && npm run serve
scripts.dev:warning:
echo "\033[0;31mBEWARE!!! This environment you use only on your's own responsibility\033[0m
"
scripts.dev: npm run dev:build && npm run dev:warning && npm run serve
scripts.dev:forever: npm run dev:build && npm run serve-forever
scripts.stage: npm run stage:build && npm run serve
scripts.stage:forever: npm run stage:build && npm run serve-forever
scripts.prod: npm run prod:build && npm run serve
scripts.prod:forever: npm run prod:build && npm run serve-forever
scripts.serve-forever: forever start -l forever.log -o logs/out.log -e logs/error.log -a -p logs --minUptime 1000 --spinSleepTime 1000 ./node_modules/.bin/ws --directory ./client/dist --spa ./tools/index.html --port ${PORT:=3001} --rewrite '/ -> /tools'
